Class cStar

java.lang.Object
Data.cObjectBase
Data.cStar
public class cStar extends cObjectBase
Represents a star system containing planets in the StarViewer application. This class extends cObjectBase to inherit naming functionality and manages a collection of planets orbiting the star. It supports various stellar classifications according to the Morgan-Keenan system.

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    cStar.eStarType
    Enumeration of stellar classification types based on the Morgan-Keenan system.

  • Constructor Details

    • cStar

      public cStar(String name, cStar.eStarType type)
      Constructs a star with the specified name and stellar type. Uses the standby logger as the default logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the star
      type - the stellar classification of the star

    • cStar

      public cStar(String name)
      Constructs a star with the specified name and default type (G-class). Uses the standby logger as the default logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the star

    • cStar

      public cStar(String name, cStar.eStarType type, cLoggingBase logger)
      Constructs a star with the specified name, type, and logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the star
      type - the stellar classification of the star
      logger - the logger to use for this star system

    • cStar

      public cStar(String name, cLoggingBase logger)
      Constructs a star with the specified name, default type (G-class), and logger.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the star
      logger - the logger to use for this star system

  • Method Details

    • ClearPlanets

      public void ClearPlanets()
      Clears all planets from the star system. Also clears all moons from each planet before removing them.

    • AddPlanet

      public void AddPlanet(cPlanet planet) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Appends a planet to the end of the star system's planet list. If the planet is already in the system, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      planet - the planet to add to the star system
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the planet is null

    • AddPlanet

      public void AddPlanet(cPlanet planet, int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, IllegalArgumentException
      Inserts a planet at a specific index in the star system's planet list. If the planet is already in the system, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      planet - the planet to add to the star system
      index - the index at which to insert the planet
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds
      IllegalArgumentException - if the planet is null

    • RemovePlanet

      public void RemovePlanet(cPlanet planet) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes a planet from the star system by reference. If the planet is not in the system, a warning is logged but no exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      planet - the planet to remove from the star system
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the planet is null

    • RemovePlanet

      public void RemovePlanet(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Removes a planet from the star system by index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the planet to remove
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds

    • GetPlanet

      public cPlanet GetPlanet(int index) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets a reference to a planet at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the planet to retrieve
      Returns:
      the planet at the specified index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds

    • GetPlanetCount

      public int GetPlanetCount()
      Gets the number of planets in the star system.
      Returns:
      the count of planets orbiting this star

    • GetStarType

      public cStar.eStarType GetStarType()
      Gets the stellar classification of this star.
      Returns:
      the stellar type of this star

    • SetStarType

      public void SetStarType(cStar.eStarType type)
      Sets the stellar classification of this star.
      Parameters:
      type - the new stellar type to set

    • ToString

      public String ToString(boolean recursive)
      Returns a string representation of the star system with optional recursive details.
      Parameters:
      recursive - if true, includes detailed information about all orbiting planets
      Returns:
      a string representation showing the star name, type, planet count, and optionally detailed planet information

    • ToString

      public String ToString()
      Returns a string representation of the star system without recursive details.
      Overrides:
      ToString in class cObjectBase
      Returns:
      a basic string representation of the star system

    • GetRandomStarType

      public static cStar.eStarType GetRandomStarType(Random rand)
      Gets a random stellar type using the provided random number generator. This is a static utility method that can be used without creating a star instance.
      Parameters:
      rand - the random number generator to use
      Returns:
      a randomly selected stellar type

    • GetRandomStarType

      public static cStar.eStarType GetRandomStarType()
      Gets a random stellar type using a new random number generator. This is a static utility method that can be used without creating a star instance.
      Returns:
      a randomly selected stellar type
